name: featherweight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a boxer who weighs more than a bantamweight but less than a lightweight, or this division of boxing weight: He won world titles as a flyweight, featherweight, and lightweight.featherweight title He lost his WBC world featherweight title in April last year.featherweight champion Ireland's defending featherweight champion got his European championship campaign off to a winning start. at featherweight In my youth I fought as an amateur at featherweight. Compare
bantamweight
cruiserweight
flyweight
heavyweight
light heavyweight
lightweight
middleweight
superheavyweight
welterweight
More examplesFewer examplesHe won the featherweight crown in 1937.He turned professional when he was sixteen and then fought for the featherweight title of Great Britain.
